1234380.name: Era of Survival
1234380.description:

While Iâ€™m not currently posting updates, Iâ€™m still actively working on the game behind the scenes. A new era commences. The Age of Technology has ended, allowing nature to reestablish balance and order. This emerging world, abundant in diverse animal and plant life, presents renewed challenges rooted in fundamental survival: agriculture, hunting, defense, and the construction of adequate shelter.

Success now depends on the ability to adapt, establish a foundation, and seek progress within this revitalized environment. Will you persevere to live with the land? Or will you strip the world bare, kill anything in sight, and rule with an iron fist?

The objective is for Jack to survive within the natural ecosystem, using available strategies or resources.Â Help Jack secure food, water, clothing, and shelterâ€”whether a modest home or a tall building. Assist him in developing expansive farms, staying warm and dry, and crafting stronger tools to overcome bigger challenges. Protect him against hostile animals and elements, using brain or brawn.

ğŸ—ºï¸ A BALANCED WORLDÂ ğŸ—ºï¸

Jack can explore a world with changing weather, temperature, and day-night cycles. He'll find various pickups, forests and ponds to utilize in his quest.

ğŸ¹ GO HUNTINGÂ ğŸ¹

Make Jack a bow and send him out; he'll mostly be hunting wolves and bears, which are both dangerous predators. Equipped with a bow, strong armor and a good sense of aim, Jack will be eating his first cooked bear meat soon!

ğŸ§º SUBSISTENCE FARMINGÂ ğŸ§º

Cultivate a variety of vegetables, ensuring their proper irrigation and care until that sweet harvest.

ğŸ—ï¸ CONSTRUCTIONÂ ğŸ—ï¸

Jack needs a dry, warm place to sleep and relax. Build him any type of home using at least 15 construction parts, in any design or size.

ğŸ“¦ RESOURCE MANAGEMENTÂ ğŸ“¦

Jack should manage his available resources efficiently. If he continues to remove all the trees near his home, he will eventually need to travel increasingly greater distances to obtain additional wood. He should also utilize his storage capacity judiciously by prioritizing essential items and avoiding unnecessary accumulation.

ğŸ£ FISHINGÂ ğŸ£

Jack has several long-term survival strategies. Residing near a wolf den can help maintain a steady food source, as can living close to a dam and fishing for meals.

"And much more! Seriously! I promise you; this is the most unique game you've ever played.Â Unique gameplay that exists thanks to a unique software design.Â I would really appreciate your support in buying a copy, after all, all purchase funds go back into development, not my pocket." - Dev ğŸ’™
